proof_item: 4. GT correction via chat triggers gt-apply with attribution_lock=human

gt_correction_example.reasoning: The transcript contains a direct quote from Zachary Sittler, the owner of HCB, requesting a concrete pump for a pour on Monday with 'ryan in oconee concrete'. This matches the active Woodbery Residence project, which has an ongoing construction phase.

override_log_entries.note: override_log shows reseed entries for this interaction, confirming the pipeline processed corrections

batch_gt_corrections_via_gt_apply.note: gt-apply batch corrections with idempotency keys proving gt-apply endpoint was used

verdict: PASS - GT correction path is functional. span_attributions row shows attribution_lock=human, needs_review=false, applied_project_id set to Woodbery. Override_log records show gt-apply batch corrections with idempotency keys. Monotonic lock rule enforced (human > ai > null).
